caption.p: Radicle elongation inhibition of ( a) the garden cress and ( b) the annual ryegrass seedlings by the leaf extract of the Clermont and Toogoolawah biotypes of parthenium weed. The log of the actual concentrations ranging from 0.12 to 2.00 mg mL −1 was taken to fit the linear regression curves. Error bars represent ± one standard error.
